author: mwomack
msg: Added as matching receiver for JMSAppender.  Still needs more testing, but added so others can review.

author: mwomack
msg: Made setPort/getPort public instead of protected.  Mistake that they were ever made protected.

author: mwomack
msg: Added code to parse plugin elements and start the resulting plugin object.
Added code to fire a configuration changed event on the repository being configured.

author: mwomack
msg: Added description for plugin elements.  Similar to appenders, 0 or more of them can appear after appenders in the xml format.

author: mwomack
msg: Added code to register and maintain a listener for LoggerRepository events.  When reset or shutdown messages recieved, all plugins associated with that repository are stopped.
